p.span: Creates a Saved Search that is global to all apps.

| xsvCreateSavedSearch app=search name="Create Context - Height in Height" search="index=demographics | stats count(Height) as count avg(Height) as avg min(Height) as min max(Height) as max median(Height) as median stdev(Height) as size BY Gender | xsCreateDDContext name=Height app=search container=Height scope=search class='Gender' terms='low,medium,high' notes='junk' read='*' search='index=demographics | stats count(Height) as count avg(Height) as avg min(Height) as min max(Height) as max median(Height) as median stdev(Height) as size BY Gender' shape=pi type=median_centered uom='inches' write='*'"
Creates a Saved Search associated with the Search app named "Create Context - Height in Height" that has a search string for creating a Data Defined Context.
The application this saved search is associated.
The name of the saved search.

The HTTP response code from the Splunk REST service used to create the saved searh is returned. An HTTP Error Code of 201 indicates the saved search was created successfully and HTTP Error Code of 409 indicates saved search already exists. All other HTTP Error Codes indicate a failure.
